messages.title: My pledge to you
messages.content: Bring jobs and investment to our City. Protect and enhance health facilities outside of the city centre. An in-out EU referendum, free from any political party. Local referendums on important issues where the people's voice will truly be heard.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Bring jobs and investment to Southampton.
Protect and enhance health facilities outside of the city centre.
An in-out EU referendum, free from any political party.
Local referendums on important issues where the people's voice will truly be heard.

issues.brexitEurope: An in-out EU referendum, free from any political party.

issues.health: Protect and enhance health facilities outside of the city centre.
